items.content_html: dohash is a lightweight npm package that provides a simple way to hash and encode strings for basic data obfuscation. It is not designed for secure hashing or encryption purposes, but rather for adding a layer of string transformation that can be useful when storing data locally or in cookies.
items.title: checkiamsiam/dohash-npm-package: dohash is a lightweight npm package that provides a simple way to hash and encode strings for basic data obfuscation. It is not designed for secure hashing or encryption purposes, but rather for adding a layer of string transformation that can be useful when storing data locally or in cookies.

items.content_html: JavaScript (JS) is a lightweight, interpreted, or just-in-time compiled programming language with first-class functions. While it is most well-known as the scripting language for Web pages, many non-browser environments also use it, such as Node.js, Apache CouchDB and Adobe Acrobat.
items.title: sami12344/Javascript_revision_01: JavaScript (JS) is a lightweight, interpreted, or just-in-time compiled programming language with first-class functions. While it is most well-known as the scripting language for Web pages, many non-browser environments also use it, such as Node.js, Apache CouchDB and Adobe Acrobat.

items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.
